doc:
Kevin Dillon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kevin_Dillon 0 Kevin Brady Dillon (born August 19, 1965) is an American actor. He is best known for portraying Johnny "Drama" Chase on the HBO comedy series Entourage, Bunny in the war film Platoon, and John Densmore in the musical biopic The Doors. He was nominated for three Primetime Emmy Awards and a Golden Globe Award for his performance on Entourage. Kevin_Brady_Dillon ( born August_19_,_1965 ) is an_American_actor . He is_best_known for portraying Johnny_"_Drama_"_Chase on the_HBO_comedy_series_Entourage , Bunny in the_war_film_Platoon , and John_Densmore in the_musical_biopic_The_Doors . He was_nominated for three_Primetime_Emmy_Awards and a_Golden_Globe_Award for his_performance on Entourage .
